name: Fissure
effect: Deals 1 Additional Damage for each 20% of the Foe's HP they are missing. Ignore Defenses. Applies all Damage as Wounds. Can only be used Once per Battle. -5 Accuracy.
description: The user tears the ground apart in a monstrous display of force. If the foe falls through the fissure it might need a rescue team to get it out.
